productDescription: Thanks to the compact design, your wallet, phone and other essential items fit perfectly. She is also small enough that you can move freely during the day and evening. This bag has one large compartment and four extra compartments, two with a zipper and two without. Yama is made of leather.

optionalInfo.material: Our bags are made of naturally tanned leather. No chemicals were used during this process.
optionalInfo.fit:
- B18 x H13 x D7 cm
- push button closure
- adjustable strap; min 46 cm, max 58 cm
- inside: 1 large compartment and 4 extra compartments; 2 with zipper 2 without
optionalInfo.production: BAGOA is fairly made in India.
